content.text:
This album was specially designed and hand-bound for you by WEITZ-COLEMAN using only the finest calf and Moroccan skins which are individually selected and tanned for bookbinding. Variations in color and surface markings are natural characteristics of fine leather and are your assurance of its quality. The buttery softness of calfskin give it great tactile appeal and lends itself to easy scuffing which develops into an exquisite antique patina. We recommend that the binding be treated with lanolin and gristfoot oil at least once a year. You may bring in your WEITZ-COLEMAN binding for a complimentary treatment.

WEITZ & SIMPLY THE FINEST BOOKBINDING - ESTABLISHED 1909
COLEMAN - 1377 LEXINGTON AVENUE, NEW YORK, N.Y. 10128
(212) 831-2213
www.weitzcoleman.com
www.albumsalbums.com

Variations in color and surface markings are natural characteristics of fine leather and are your assurance of its quality. The buttery softness of calfskin give it great tactile appeal and lends itself to easy scuffing which develops into an exquisite antique patina. insights: Birthday book was custom bound by Weitz-Coleman, a luxury bookbinding company established in 1909
Located on Lexington Avenue in Manhattan's Upper East Side (wealthy area)
Album uses high-end materials: finest calf and Moroccan skins
Indicates significant expense and personal investment in creating this birthday book
Professional bookbinding service suggests this was an important keepsake or gift
Upper East Side location consistent with Epstein's wealthy social circle
